column3: Generate NLP insights by executing insight-specific functions for a given selections of emails
Load and parse .json email files (text & meta-data)
Clean the email text extracted from a MIME message
Parse and format the email date extracted from a MIME message
Generate additional date variables based on a cleaned date column
Clean and standardize the contact fields extracted from a MIME message
Convert an email-level DataFrame into an link-level DataFrame
Generate a data.frame with the most common contacts
Classify a list of links based on a provided contact - label crosswalk
